column2: 1. For protection, motorcyclists are required by law to:
column4: signal turns, lane changes and stops.

column2: 2. When you are in a line of traffic that is crossing a railroad track that has no signals or gates:
column4: you may pass slower drivers crossing the track.
column6: you have the right of way and do not need to check for trains.
column8: before you start to cross, you need to make sure there is space to get all the way across the tracks without stopping.
